summary: tired of a weak elven bow with an enchantment that can be easily surpassed by an enchanter with modest skill? Well, no more! Auriels bow is now truly a weapon of the gods. The ultimate undead killing machine.
descriptionHtml:
the bow now does fire damage on top of the original sun damage enchantment.
the bow is now lighter for sneak archers

It now also does more base damage

The bow will turn almost all undead (including draugr deathlords) with the exclusion of nightlord and nightmaster vampires

it is now considered a silver weapon (for increased damage against undead)

it also has the AOE explosion effect of dawnbreaker

enchantment is now unlimited

WARNING: this bow is overpowered. I made this for myself. I have a lvl 225 necromage vampire character.

**Unique weapons should be powerful** it is lore freindly and the only reason is to not be game breaking in the eyes of bethesda

this bow is not game breaking, even with full archery on novice difficulty it will only barely one shot a deathlord

it is powerful in ways other than damage

if you want to try out my character, you can find it here

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66699/?
author: Ninety9rising
